metadata.title: CVE-2022-4143 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.7 before 15.8.5, from 15.9 before 15.9.4, and from 15.10 before 15.10.1that allows for crafted, unapproved MRs to be introduced and merged withoutauthorization

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
